text: hi my name is Matt Wood and I'm here at
the AWS headquarters in Seattle to talk
to you about data transfer there are a
couple of ways to load data into AWS
today you can use Direct Connect which
gives you a direct connection into the
AWS data centers you can stream
real-time data using Amazon Kinesis or
you can ship us physical media using
snowball today we're adding a new
feature to S3 called transfer
acceleration for direct uploads this
provides provides wide area network
acceleration for S3 without the need to
use custom protocols or appliances all
you need to do is go into the AWS
Management console and Checker box and
your transfer to S3 will be accelerated
by up to six times by intelligent
routing on the AWS Global Network this
is perfect for incremental updates which
have to travel long distances and it has
a really simple pricing model either
it's faster or it's free transfer
acceleration is available now for Amazon
S3 thanks a lot
